title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, January 9, 2022
description: "The writer of originality, unless dead, is always shocking, scandalous; novelty disturbs and repels." –Simone de Beauvoir, born this day in Paris, 1980.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "The writer of originality, unless dead, is always shocking, scandalous; novelty disturbs and repels." –Simone de Beauvoir, born this day in Paris, 1980.
